E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 6/11/1989
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Tommy Boggs



Date: Friday, 6/13/1989
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Mike Boddicker



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1989
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Ron Guidry



Date: Monday, 6/16/1989
Subject: Progress of John Flaherty
Dear Sir,
John Flaherty has nothing more to prove at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an AVG of .307 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1989
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Chico Walker



Date: Friday, 6/20/1989
Subject: Asbel Larosa learns new position
Asbel Larosa has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director

Regards,
Greg Biagini
